manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: When only a personal note will do Delight your recipients with this beautiful Butterflies Note Card!

Premium boxed stationery set comes with 14 note cards and 15 envelopes Delicately detailed Butterflies flutter above airy meadow flowers that shimmer with subtle glitter accents. Textured linen finish. Blue scalloped edging. Superior card stock Inside, you'll find a smooth-finish writing surface -- no smudging or streaking. Quality card stock takes pen beautifully. Cards have blank interiors for your personal messages. Matching envelopes included Stationery envelopes are made of quality paper.

Beautiful note cards are a pleasure to use Versatile card is suitable for a variety of occasions Perfect for a wide range of special occasions, from 'Thank You' to 'Thinking of You.' Pretty and practical! Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp, clean note cards of substantial stock and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. The perfect complement to your correspondence Brighten someone's day. Stay in touch with a handwritten note! About these Butterflies Note Cards: Set includes 14 folded cards with blank interiors. 15 soft blue stationery envelopes. Cards measure 5'' wide x 3-1/2'' high. Stationery set comes in a designer box with a clear acetate lid.
Butterflies Address Book Butterflies SM Journal Butterflies Stationery

Our Company History In 1928, at the age of twenty-two, Peter Beilenson began printing books on a small press in the basement of his parents’ home in Larchmont, New York. Peter - and later, his wife, Edna - sought to create fine books that sold at prices even a pauper could afford. Today, still family owned and operated, Peter Pauper Press continues to honor our founders’ legacy - and our customers’ expectations - of beauty, quality, and value. Image: Peter Pauper Press headquarters, Mount Vernon, New York, circa 1948.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful. Perfect little note card. Prettier than picture. Love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Subtle but very beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these cards several years ago to write thank you notes and I’ve been looking for them for six years. The design is subtle but the blue glittering butterflies are simply stunningly beautiful along with the scalloped edge of the card and lovely pale sky blue envelopes. Perfect for a quick hello or thank you! Very classy company and a reasonable price! Thanks Peter Pauper Press and Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs!
reviews.reviewText: These little cards are perfect for “thank you “ invitations and whenever a little note is needed. Plus they are really beautiful !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2020
reviews.reviewText: These notecards are so delicate and beautiful, very girly. They're well made, and the paper is substantial, not flimsy. Love the multi-colored sparkles -- they're not over-done and are tasteful. It comes with one extra envelope, which is appreciated. I do agree with other reviews though -- the product is beautiful, but the box cover is unbelievably flimsy, which detracts from the quality of the note card. If the manufacturer would change the cover (the bottom is solid and very well constructed), it would make this product even better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2020
reviews.reviewText: These cards are so cute! The quality of the paper is excellent and the design is tastefully done. I've decided to no longer waste my money at the card store (where cards have become crazy expensive,) but to use these as my go to for every occasion. And I know from my own experience, that I rarely read the ready made sentiment of a greeting card, but I love if someone has taken the time to include a message. These cute cards make so much more sense! I'll be buying more in different patterns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Nice cards.. Very cute and classy. Nice paper stock. They are a little small, but they present well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Cute and just the right size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good note cards to have available.
reviews.reviewText: I like have having some note cards available to send to friends & relatives. A short note may be all that's needed to say "I'm thinking about you". These are very nice cards that I'm pleased to have available for a short note.
Just what I was looking for to send a delicate message. Very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Bought to send notification if a funeral. Beautiful and made from quality paper
Very pleased with the product. High quality with good finish at very reasonable price. I do wish the size is slightly larger. A 6" x 4" will be more presentable.
Cartes de bon format pour des vœux, des anniversaires ou des remerciements. Elles sont vraiment très pratiques et originales. Merci !
